thread.title: EXO Travel now open for business in Malaysia
thread.title_full: EXO Travel now open for business in Malaysia

author: Bangkok, September 9, 2015
title: EXO Travel now open for business in Malaysia
text:
EXO Travel now open for business in Malaysia Bangkok, September 9, 2015 

INBOUND tour operator EXO Travel has added Malaysia to its portfolio with the opening of a local office, coming on the tailwind of the recent acquisition of Insight Borneo, a Malaysia-based DMC strong in incentive and group travel. 

EXO Malaysia is located in Sabah, Kota Kinabalu, and has already begun operations, having ramped up capacity over the preceding months. 

Explaining the move, Olivier Colomes, CEO of EXO Travel said: “The diverse nature of Malaysia’s product and environment offers the perfect combination of attributes that our clients are looking for. 

“Malaysia provides EXO opportunities to fulfill every niche market we operate in, namely tailor-made, adventure travel and MICE. It will also enable us to provide more combined trips with the neighboring countries we are already established in.” 

EXO Travel currently has offices in Vietnam, Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar, Japan, China and Indonesia. Its Malaysian outpost will serve to manage small-scale operations in Singapore as well. 

Nicky Henderson has been appointed general manager of EXO Malaysia. She was formerly the product manager and director of product at EXO Travel, as well as being a tour guide in Malaysia before that.
